title: Director of finance to maintain records
context: ยง289-7 Director of finance to maintain records. The director of finance shall promulgate, pursuant to chapter 91, the rules and regulations necessary for the carrying out of this chapter and also prescribe the forms for the applications, licenses, and other documents mentioned herein, and shall create and maintain in the director of finance&rsquo;s office an appropriate filing system to accommodate the records required to be filed with the director of finance by this chapter. [L 1967, c 277, ยง8; HRS ยง289-7; gen ch 1985]
